Topic.Title: Anyone here thinking of buying MCP soon?

Message.Title: $7.35~7.45 tomorrow or by Friday!!!! It's getting close but not yet...
Message.Msg: Don't buy it yet. ETFC will fall under $7 by the year-end. And it may further drop to $5s if Q4 eps is bad. I will signal when you should get in. It will be more likely around $5.15~5.35 price range. Once it hits $5.15, then it will reverse to high $8s by Q2-13 CC!! GLTA!!
